ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What features does your farming app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app offers crop planning tools, weather forecasts, pest identification, yield tracking, and marketplace connections for farmers.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app suitable for both small-scale and large-scale farming?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our app is designed to cater to farmers of all scales, from small homesteads to large commercial operations, with customizable features to suit your needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How does the app help improve farm productivity?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: By providing real-time data, predictive analytics, and best practice recommendations, our app helps optimize resource use, improve crop yields, and increase overall farm efficiency.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a free version of the app available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer a free basic version with essential features. Premium features are available through paid subscription plans to suit different farming needs and budgets.

FEATURE_1_BODY: Optimize your farm's layout and schedule planting with our intelligent crop planning tool.

FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our farming app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What features does your farming app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app offers crop planning, weather forecasts, pest and disease identification, yield tracking, and market price information to help farmers optimize their operations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app suitable for all types of farms?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our app is designed to cater to various farm sizes and types, including crop farms, livestock farms, and mixed farming operations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How does the weather forecast feature work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We integrate data from multiple meteorological sources to provide accurate, localized weather forecasts up to 14 days in advance, helping farmers plan their activities effectively.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I access the app offline?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, many features of our app work offline. You can sync data when you have an internet connection to ensure you always have the latest information available.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a free trial available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! We offer a 30-day free trial so you can explore all the features and see how our app can benefit your farming operations before committing to a subscription.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Maximize your yields and streamline operations with our cutting-edge agricultural management app
